refnamediv.refpurpose: Write a single boolean or a matrix of boolean into Scilab memory using call_scilab

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int C2F(cwritebmat)(char *name, int *m, int *n, int *mat, unsigned long name_len);

listitem.para: The name of the future Scilab variable
The actual matrix of boolean (array of int). Note that it is going to be stored in Scilab columnwise.
The length of the variable name (fortran compatibility)
C2F is just a macro which provides to this function the ability to be called from fortran

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This help describes how to use the function cwritebmat.
Using this function will basically do the same as A=[ T F F T ]; but straight into Scilab memory with call_scilab.
